room_title: Escape room "Zombie Room" by The Great Escape Clovis in Fresno
review: This was our family’s first time in an escape room and we had so much fun in the zombie room. We had no idea there was a “live” zombie in the room which made it very exciting and challenging. The puzzles and riddles were very challenging. We actually did not complete the escape, but had a blast trying. We will for sure do be back!!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Room" by The Great Escape Clovis in Fresno
review: I had so much fun! The zombie room was so intense! Loved every minute!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Room" by The Great Escape Clovis in Fresno
review: My friend wanted to do the zombie room for her sons b-day so we decided to do the mafia room at the same time!! We all had an ABSOLUTE BLAST!! I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS TO ANYONE WHO LOVES A CHALLENGE!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Room" by The Great Escape Clovis in Fresno
review: First time ever doing an escape room... Gotta tell you, was super fun and exhilarating!!! Did the Zombie room for a friends birthday and it literally came down to the last minute!!! Totally recommend it, we all had a blast!!!
